author: Xbox
description:
Check out the Mighty Morphin Bundle when it hits the Shop mid-August. It includes the Red Ranger, Black Ranger, Pink Ranger, Yellow Ranger, and Blue Ranger Outfits — plus accessories like the Go Go Power Rangers - Redux Jam Track! Battle Pass holders will also be able to unlock the Dino Megazord Outfit by completing Quests starting September 16.

And prepare to Power Up as Megazord for a splashy midseason takeover.
